info.description:
====================================
Human Resources Payslip Change State
====================================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png
    :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status
    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png
    :target: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0-standalone.html
    :alt: License: AGPL-3
.. |badge3| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-OCA%2Fhr-lightgray.png?logo=github
    :target: https://github.com/OCA/hr/tree/12.0/hr_payslip_change_state
    :alt: OCA/hr
.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png
    :target: https://translation.odoo-community.org/projects/hr-12-0/hr-12-0-hr_payslip_change_state
    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png
    :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/116/12.0
    :alt: Try me on Runbot

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module process payslip batches:

* This module allows to mass change Payslip states
* The module checks if the required action is allowed for each payslip
* If any of the payslips are not in a suitable state a warning message will
  pop up and no changes will be made

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Usage
=====

#. Go to the payslip list view and select the ones you want to .
#. Unfold the "More" menu on the top and click on "Change state"
#. Select the action to execute

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/hr/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/hr/issues/new?body=module:%20hr_payslip_change_state%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.

Maintainers
~~~~~~~~~~~

   :alt: Odoo Community Association

info.name: odoo12-addon-hr-payslip-change-state
info.summary: Change the state of many payslips at a time
info.html_description:
This module process payslip batches:

  • This module allows to mass change Payslip states
  • The module checks if the required action is allowed for each payslip
  • If any of the payslips are not in a suitable state a warning message will pop up and no changes will be made

Table of contents

  • Usage
  • Bug Tracker
  • Credits
    • Authors
    • Contributors
    • Maintainers

Usage

  1. Go to the payslip list view and select the ones you want to .
  2. Unfold the “More” menu on the top and click on “Change state”
  3. Select the action to execute

Bug Tracker

Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
